org.apache.distributedlog.logsegment

Interface LogSegmentMetadataStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    @Beta
public interface LogSegmentMetadataStore
extends Closeable
    Interface for log segment metadata store. All operations that modify log segments should be executed under a Transaction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Delete a log segment segment under transaction txn.

      Retrieve the log segment associated path.

      Retrieve the list of log segments under logSegmentsPath and register a listener for subsequent changes for the list of log segments.

    • Method Detail

      • transaction

        org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction<Object> transaction()
        Start the transaction on changing log segment metadata store.
        Returns:
        transaction of the log segment metadata store.

      • storeMaxLogSegmentSequenceNumber

        void storeMaxLogSegmentSequenceNumber(org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction<Object> txn,
                                      LogMetadata logMetadata,
                                      org.apache.bookkeeper.versioning.Versioned<Long> sequenceNumber,
                                      org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction.OpListener<org.apache.bookkeeper.versioning.Version> listener)
        Store the maximum log segment sequence number on path.
        Parameters:
        txn - transaction to execute for storing log segment sequence number.
        logMetadata - metadata of the log stream
        sequenceNumber - log segment sequence number to store
        listener - listener on the result to this operation

      • storeMaxTxnId

        void storeMaxTxnId(org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction<Object> txn,
                   LogMetadataForWriter logMetadata,
                   org.apache.bookkeeper.versioning.Versioned<Long> transactionId,
                   org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction.OpListener<org.apache.bookkeeper.versioning.Version> listener)
        Store the maximum transaction id for path
        Parameters:
        txn - transaction to execute for storing transaction id
        logMetadata - metadata of the log stream
        transactionId - transaction id to store
        listener - listener on the result to this operation

      • createLogSegment

        void createLogSegment(org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction<Object> txn,
                      LogSegmentMetadata segment,
                      org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction.OpListener<Void> opListener)
        Create a log segment segment under transaction txn. NOTE: this operation shouldn't be a blocking call. and it shouldn't execute the operation immediately. the operation should be executed via Transaction.execute()
        Parameters:
        txn - transaction to execute for this operation
        segment - segment to create
        opListener - the listener on the operation result

      • deleteLogSegment

        void deleteLogSegment(org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction<Object> txn,
                      LogSegmentMetadata segment,
                      org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction.OpListener<Void> opListener)
        Delete a log segment segment under transaction txn. NOTE: this operation shouldn't be a blocking call. and it shouldn't execute the operation immediately. the operation should be executed via Transaction.execute()
        Parameters:
        txn - transaction to execute for this operation
        segment - segment to delete

      • updateLogSegment

        void updateLogSegment(org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction<Object> txn,
                      LogSegmentMetadata segment)
        Update a log segment segment under transaction txn. NOTE: this operation shouldn't be a blocking call. and it shouldn't execute the operation immediately. the operation should be executed via Transaction.execute()
        Parameters:
        txn - transaction to execute for this operation
        segment - segment to update

      • getLogSegment

        CompletableFuture<LogSegmentMetadata> getLogSegment(String logSegmentPath)
        Retrieve the log segment associated path.
        Parameters:
        logSegmentPath - path to store log segment metadata
        Returns:
        future of the retrieved log segment metadata

      • getLogSegmentNames

        CompletableFuture<org.apache.bookkeeper.versioning.Versioned<List<String>>> getLogSegmentNames(String logSegmentsPath,
                                                                                               LogSegmentNamesListener listener)
        Retrieve the list of log segments under logSegmentsPath and register a listener for subsequent changes for the list of log segments.
        Parameters:
        logSegmentsPath - path to store list of log segments
        listener - log segment listener on log segment changes
        Returns:
        future of the retrieved list of log segment names

      • unregisterLogSegmentListener

        void unregisterLogSegmentListener(String logSegmentsPath,
                                  LogSegmentNamesListener listener)
        Unregister a log segment listener on log segment changes under logSegmentsPath.
        Parameters:
        logSegmentsPath - log segments path
        listener - log segment listener on log segment changes
